rooms.name: Gateway to Temple
rooms.description:
You stand before the grand gateway to the Temple of the White Lotus Clan.
Twin snow white and golden dragons decorate the black steel gates of the 
entrance.
A small path winds down the mountain to the east.
The black steel gates are to the south.

exits.description: A small path winds off down the mountain to the forest below.
You see the black steel gates of the White lotus

rooms.name: Path in Courtyard
rooms.description:
The path is made of large flat stones. Beautiful stone gardens fill these large
courtyard. In fact the only place to walk  where you will not destroy 
something beautiful is on this path. The sky above you is unusually 
blue with puffy white clouds. Everything is tranquil and harmonious.

exits.description: You see the black steel gates of the White lotus
You see large stone steps that climb up to the temple.

rooms.name: Stone Steps
rooms.description:
Large roughly carved stone steps lead up to the temple. The look like
quite a climb. More stone gardens and small shrubs like the stone steps.
From this far below the Temple, it seems to tower over you with its
wooden beams seemingly stretching out to the heavens.

exits.description: You see a path that winds through the courtyard.
You see stone steps ascending the mountain.

rooms.name: Stone Steps
rooms.description:
Large roughly carved stone steps lead up to the temple. You are about
half way to the temple. This climb seems almost endless. Small lizards
occasionally scamper across the stones before you. The wind seems to
be a bit more brisk as you climb higher towards the temple.

exits.description: You see stone steps descending the mountain.
You see the Temple of the White Lotus Clan.

rooms.name: Before the Temple of the White Lotus Clan
rooms.description:
You stand at the top of a steep stone staircase that connects the temple
to the valley below. The temples wooden structure seem in harmony
with the bare rock face that it sits on top of. Before you a short wooden
stair leads up to the entry doors of the temple. The whole building is
an ancient Chinese architecture style. Wood beams and black slate tiles
hang over the well polished wooden deck that lead around the temple.
The large red double doors of the Temple are to the South.
A steep stone staircase leads down the mountain to the North.

exits.description: You see stone steps descending the mountain.
You see wooden steps leading up to the temple doors.

rooms.name: Temple Doors
rooms.description:
Two large red double doors stand before you. The red wood of the doors
are bound by black iron braces. Twin white and golden dragons adorn
the doors. Two halves of a white lotus come together as the door closes
to make the single white flower of the clan. Well polished wooden
decks lead off to the east and west.

exits.description: You see stone steps descending the mountain.
You see the wooden deck that leads around the temple.
You see the wooden deck that leads around the temple.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. You pause to lean
against the railing and admire the view from this mountain top. Far below
you see Crystalmir lake, glimmering faintly.  To the northwest you see a
large wooden building that connects to the walkway further to the west.
The walkway continues to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. Pretty pink and white
flowers grown next to the railing. The temple wall to the south of you is
decorated with the symbol of the white lotus.
The walkway continues to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. North of you is a
large wooden building. The bustling noise of many people can be heard
from within. 
The Building is to the north.
The walkway continues to the east and south.

exits.description: You see a large wooden building.
You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. To the North you
see a large wooden building. As you look over the railing notice that the
mountain drops sharply away. The shear wall of the mountain seems
to disappear into the mists far below. 
The walkway continues to the north and south.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

The walkway continues to the north and south.

rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. 
To the northeast you see a large garden. Further to the south you see a 
wooden staircase that leads down to the garden below. As you look across
the railing to the east you notice a couple small paths that wind around from
the staircase and then disappear into the garden.
Well polished wooden decks lead off to the north and south.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. 
To the east you see a large garden. 
Well polished wooden decks lead off to the west and south.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. 
To the north you see a large garden. 
Well polished wooden decks lead off to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Walkway Around Temple
rooms.description:
A polished wooden walkway leads around the temple. 
To the north you see a large garden. Further to the west you see a pair
of large red doors and a stone stairway that leads down the mountain.
Well polished wooden decks lead off to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden walkway.
You see a polished wooden walkway.

rooms.name: Stone Path
rooms.description:
This is a small stone and gravel path that winds though a beautiful rock
garden. To either side of you are large patches of sculpted sand. To the
north you see the Temple of the White Lotus Clan. Wooden steps lead
up to a walkway. To the south you can hear the shouts of fighting.

exits.description: You see a polished wooden stairway.

rooms.name: Practice Yard
rooms.description:
You stand in the practice yard of the temple. Various students are here
practicing their kung fu. This is basically a large cement yard. Several
higher monks are walking about the practice area correcting the students.
To the north you see a stone path that winds through a beautiful rock garden
and up to the temple.

exits.description: You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.

rooms.name: Practice Yard
rooms.description:
You stand in the practice yard of the temple. Various students are here
practicing their kung fu. This is basically a large cement yard. Several
higher monks are walking about the practice area correcting the students.
To the north and east, large stone buddhas look down apon you.

exits.description: You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.

To the east is a bamboo bridge.

exits.description: You see more of the practice yard.

To the south and east of you is a dense bamboo forest.

You stand in the practice yard of the temple. Various students are here

To the north and west of you is a beautiful pond and stream.

exits.description: You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.

rooms.name: Practice Yard
rooms.description:
This is the very center of a large cement practice yard. This is where the
students of the temple come to learn kung fu. On the ground here is a
large white lotus engraved into the cement.

exits.description: You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.
You see more of the practice yard.

rooms.name: Bamboo Bridge
rooms.description:
This is a small bamboo bridge that cross a gurgling stream from the pond
to the north. To the east you can hear the sounds of instructors yelling at
the students. To the west are the training grounds of the temple.

exits.description: You see a large cement yard.
You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.

rooms.name: Training yard
rooms.description:
This area of the temple is filled with what look like small ponds. It is
rumored that these 1000 ponds were made to represent the 1000 lakes
of a mystical training grounds called Jyusenkyo. large bamboo poles
are stuck in the middle of the ponds. Many students are training
their combat skills and concentration.

exits.description: You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.
You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.
You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.

rumored that these 1000 ponds were made to represent the 1000 lakes
of a mystical training grounds called Jyusenkyo. large bamboo poles
are stuck in the middle of the ponds. Many students are training
their combat skills and concentration. To the north and east of you is
a large pond with a stream that runs under a bridge to the southeast.

exits.description: You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.
You see a whole lot of small ponds with bamboo poles.

disappears into the mists and forest below.

rooms.name: Bamboo Bridge
rooms.description:
This is a small bamboo bridge that cross a gurgling stream from the pond
to the north. To the west you can hear the sounds of instructors yelling at
the students. To the east is the arena of the temple.

exits.description: You see a large cement yard.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the north and west of you are large stone buddhas.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the north of you the bamboo forest becomes too dense to allow
passage.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the north and east of you the bamboo forest becomes too dense to allow
passage.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the east of you is the steep edge of the mountain. Far below you can
see nothing but mists and forest.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the south and east of you is the steep edge of the mountain. Far below 
you can see nothing but mists and forest.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the south of you is the steep edge of the mountain. Far below you can 
see nothing but mists and forest.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the arena area of the temple. Here the temple monks come to
practice their skill against others. The entire arena is a bamboo forest.
Once in a while a master is known to visit this area to test the students.
To the south of you is the steep edge of the mountain. Far below you can 
see nothing but mists and forest. To the west the bamboo forest becomes
to dense to allow passage.

rooms.name: Arena
rooms.description:
You stand in the center of the arena. All around you are the green poles of
the bamboo forest. Every once in a while you catch a glimpse of a couple
of monks fighting, and then they vanish into the bamboo.

rooms.name: Stone Path
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. It seems to wind
around to the south and then back north as it disappears in to some very
dense vegetation. To the west of you are the wooden steps that lead up to
the temple.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. It continues south
and then winds back to the north before it disappears in to the thick garden
area. The path is named after the famous Mantis style of the gardener
Xiang Fung.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. It continues east
and then winds back to the north before it disappears in to the thick garden
area. Xiang Fung was once a the peaceful gardener of the temple. He was
well known for his skill in the Mantis style of kung fu.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. The path continues
to the north and west. To the north you can see the beautiful gardens of
Xiang Fung.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. The path continues
to the north and south. To the north you can see the beautiful gardens of
Xiang Fung.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. This is the
beginning of the gardens of Xiang Fung. He spent many hours here
tending to every flower and shrub. The garden here is so dense that
it blocks out the sky. Rays of light break through the canopy and
light the pathway. The path continues to the north.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. The garden here 
is so dense that it blocks out the sky. Rays of light break through the 
canopy and light the pathway. Something seems to be wrong here. The 
flowers seem to be wilted and and shrubs dying. From the outside this
would appear to be a beautiful paradise of a garden. From the inside it
is seems to be dying. Almost as if the very heart of the garden were
poisoned. The path continues to the west.

rooms.name: Path of the Mantis
rooms.description:
This is a small stone path that leads to the temple garden. The garden here 
is so dense that it blocks out the sky. Rays of light break through the 
canopy and light the pathway. All of the flowers and other plants are dead.
The smell of rotting vegetation and decay assaults your sense of smell.
This is definitely not the beautiful gardens that Xiang Fung once labored
so hard apon. Something new has taken over. 
The path continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Garden of the 5 Deadly Venoms
rooms.description:
As you enter this part of the garden you see a large clan symbol burned
into the ground. You recognize it as the symbol of the Poison clan. There
have been rumors that recently some of the poison clan has taken up 
residence at the Temple. Now you know what has been killing the beautiful
gardens. A path leads to the north and to the east.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path. The 
garden is a deadly quiet. The birds no longer sing, and the crickets no 
longer chirp. This is definitely not the same garden that Xiang Fung left 
so long ago.
A path leads to the north and to the west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path. The 
garden is a deadly quiet. The birds no longer sing, and the crickets no 
longer chirp. This is definitely not the same garden that Xiang Fung left so 
long ago. A gently breeze stirs the dry brown leaves that cover the soft dirt 
beneath you.
A path leads to the north and to the south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You come apon a split in the path. Many dead rosebushes almost obscure
the western path. The putrid smell of rotting vegetation turns your
stomach.
A path leads to the north and to the south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This is an obcure path, almost hidden by death rosebushes. The canopy
seems to be more dense here and the light barely seeps through the
intertwined branches overhead.
A path leads to the north and to the east.

rooms.name: Training Room of the Snake
rooms.description:
This room is filled with many different training devices. The stone walls
are richly decorated with silver silk curtains and large silver statues
of a coiled snake. Hung Wei Tung is the second pupil of the poison clan, 
and expert of the snake technique. Hung Wei Tung was brought up by a 
wealthy family and joined the Poison Clan just to learn a specialized Kung
Fu. He has come to the garden to practice his techniques and as a guest to 
the White Lotus Chief.
The only exit is to the south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
The vegetation here is a little better than that you have seen previously.
It is still far from the beauty that Xiang Fung brought to the garden.
Around you stand large green bamboo stalks, and rich beds of flowers.
The path continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path.
The path continues to the west and south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path.
The path continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path.

rooms.name: Training Room of the Lizard
rooms.description:
You stand amidst a room filled with all sorts of walls. Many walls of stone,
wood, and various other materials are propped up around the room. This
is the training room of the Yeun Sun Ho, the fourth pupil of the Poison
Clan. Yeun Sun Ho is the captain of the police in a distant village and has
come to the garden at the request of the White Lotus Chief.
The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You are on the north end of the garden path. Through the thick brush to the
north you see the sharp cliff of the mountain.
The path continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Training Room of the Scorpion
rooms.description:
This room is filled with large poles and other training devices. Here Ma
Tang comes to train. Ma Tang is the third pupil of the Poison Clan and
expert of the Scorpion technique. 
The path continues to the east, south and west.

rooms.name: Training Room of the Toad
rooms.description:
This large stone room is filled with beds of nails and sharp poles. Large
thick sheets of metal hang about the room. This is the training room of 
Lee Ho, expert of the Toad technique and fifth pupil of the Poison Clan.
The path continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: Training Room of the Centipede
rooms.description:
This room is almost devoid of any furniture or equipment. As you look up
to the ceiling you notice many objects that look as though they can be 
dropped hanging over you. This the training room of the first pupil of 
the Poison Clan, Tang Seung Qwe. 
The path continues to the east and north.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path.
The path continues to the north, east and west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Xiang Fung would be deeply saddened at the state of his garden if he knew.
The path continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Multicolored dragonflies and other exotic insects buzz by you.
The path continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
The path continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
The garden becomes to dense to pass to the west.
The path continues to the south and east.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
The path continues to the south and north.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This small path winds across a shallow pond. White lotus leaves float
gently on the suface of the water. Dead branches and murky water
contaminate the once pristine scene.
The path continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This small path winds across a shallow pond. White lotus leaves float
gently on the suface of the water. Here in the center of the pond the
water seems to be cleaner as if out of reach of the encroaching poison.
The path continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This small path winds across a shallow pond. White lotus leaves float
gently on the suface of the water. Here in the center of the pond the
water seems to be cleaner as if out of reach of the encroaching poison.
The path continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This small path winds across a shallow pond. White lotus leaves float
gently on the suface of the water. The water is murky and dark as if
a poison of some sort has contaminated it.
The path continues to the west and south.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
This is a small garden path. Decaying plants and dry brush clutters lay
across the path. What once used to be Xiang Fungs paradise, is now
nothing but overgrown weeds and dead plants.
The path continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
You walk on a small dirt path that winds through the now decaying garden.
Every couple of feet a dead branch or shrubbery blocks the path. The 
garden is a deadly quiet. The birds no longer sing, and the crickets no 
longer chirp. This is definitely not the same garden that Xiang Fung left 
so long ago.
The path continues to the west and south.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is a long wooden hallway covered with the emblems of the White
Lotus Clan. The smooth wooden floors are well polished and the sounds
of conversation can be heard farther down the hall. The wooden walkway
around the temple lies to the south.Prison cells lie to either side of you.
The hall continues to the north.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hallway.
You see a prison cell bars.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
This is one of the cells used for detaining prisoners of the Clan. It is
surprisingly clean for a prison cell. The cell is pretty much bare except for
a small bench against the far wall.
The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
This is one of the cells used for detaining prisoners of the Clan. It is
surprisingly clean for a prison cell. The cell is pretty much bare except for
a small bench against the far wall.
The only exit is to the east.

exits.description: You see a prison cell bars.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is a long wooden hallway covered with the emblems of the White
Lotus Clan. The smooth wooden floors are well polished and the sounds
of conversation can be heard farther down the hall. 
The hall continues to the north and south.
A prison cell lies to the west.
A large noisy room lies to the east.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hall.
You see a long wooden hall.
You see the bars of a prison cell.

rooms.name: Guard Room
rooms.description:
You stand in the main guard station of the Clan. This very large room is
littered with various tables and chairs. The guards spend most of their time
here either gambling or drinking. Very few people have the courage or the 
love of death to bother the White Lotus Clan.
The only exit is to the hall to the west.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
This is one of the cells used for detaining prisoners of the Clan. It is
surprisingly clean for a prison cell. The cell is pretty much bare except for
a small bench against the far wall.
The only exit is to the east.

exits.description: You see a prison cell bars.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is a long wooden hallway covered with the emblems of the White
Lotus Clan. The smooth wooden floors are well polished and the sounds
of conversation can be heard from either direction down the hall. The hall
splits here and a smaller hall leads off to the east.
The hall continues to the north,east and south.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hall.
You see a long wooden hall.
You see a long wooden hall.
You see a large room with benchs and barrels..

rooms.name: Mess Hall
rooms.description:
This is the Kitchen and mess hall for the guard building. Many long tables
and benches are lined up in this room. Very large barrels that are filled with
steamed rice sit at the end of every table.
The only exit is the hall to the east.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hall.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is a smaller hallway that splits off from the large main one. Small lotus
leaves are carved into the walls. The wooden floors are also well polished,
but appear to be less travelled than that of the main hallway.
The hall continues to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hall.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is a smaller hallway that splits off from the large main one. Small lotus
leaves are carved into the walls. The wooden floors are also well polished,
but appear to be less travelled than that of the main hallway.
The hall continues to the south and west.
There is a room to the north.

rooms.name: Armoury
rooms.description:
You stand in a room filled with many racks of weapons and armor. Most
of the equipment is in good condition and all bear the symbol of the 
White Lotus Clan.
The only exit is to the south.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
You are in a wooden hall. Your footsteps echo lightly on the well polish
floor. Grand pictures of dragons and temples are carved into the walls.
Further to the south you see a large wooden door with a dragon head
carved into it.
The hall continues to the north.

exits.description: You see a large wooden door with a dragon head carved in it.

rooms.name: General's Office
rooms.description:
This is the office of General Chow, head of the militia at the temple.
He normally sits in his office, drinks wine and laughs alot. Most
people are smart enough not to cause trouble at the temple. His office
is decorated with beautiful vases and pots full of fine chinese wine.
A large wooden door is to the north.

exits.description: You see a large wooden door with a dragon head carved in it.

rooms.name: Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
You are in a large wooden hall that runs north south. Here there are various
stories of dragons, wars and temples carved into the polished wooden walls.
To the north and to the west you hear loud sounds of voices.
The hall continues to the north and south.
There are rooms to either side of you.

exits.description: You see a room full of racks.

rooms.name: Weapons Room
rooms.description:
This is a large room filled with weapons for the militia. Many different
carvings depicting battles atop of the mountain at the temple of the White
Lotus clan span the walls.
The only exit is too the west.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description:
These are the barrack for the temple guard. Many beds and tables fill the
room. This is where the militia spends most of its time, since few people
ever are stupid enough to attack the temple and anger the White Lotus
Chief.
The only exit is too the east.

rooms.name: End of Long Wooden Hall
rooms.description:
This is the end of a long wooden hallway. As you look to the south you
see the entrance far down the hall. To the east and west come sounds of
conversation and gambling.
The hall continues to the south.
There are rooms to the east and west.

exits.description: You see a long wooden hall.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description:
These are the barrack for the temple guard. Many beds and tables fill the
room. This is where the militia spends most of its time, since few people
ever are stupid enough to attack the temple and anger the White Lotus
Chief.
The only exit is too the west.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description:
These are the barrack for the temple guard. Many beds and tables fill the
room. This is where the militia spends most of its time, since few people
ever are stupid enough to attack the temple and anger the White Lotus
Chief.
The only exit is too the east.

rooms.name: Inside the Temple Doors
rooms.description:
You stand in a grand hallway, decorated with many statues of Buddha.
Golden dragons climb the wooden columns that reach up to the ceiling
far above. The large white lotus emblem is embedded into the black
marble floor of the hallway. A pair of red wood doors lie to the north
The red wood of the doors are bound by black iron braces. Twin white 
and golden dragons adorn the doors. Two halves of a white lotus come 
together as the door closes to make the single white flower of the clan.
The hall continues to the south.

rooms.name: Hall of the Dragon
rooms.description:
You stand in a grand hallway, decorated with many statues of Buddha.
Golden dragons climb the wooden columns that reach up to the ceiling
far above. To the west you can hear the sounds of chanting. The smell
of incense fills the air. To the east is a stairway up and a dark hall.

exits.description: You see a stairway up and a dark hall
You see a room full of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Inside the Temple Doors
rooms.description:
You stand in a grand hallway, decorated with many statues of Buddha.
Golden dragons climb the wooden columns that reach up to the ceiling
far above. The large white lotus emblem is embedded into the black
marble floor of the hallway. A pair of red wood doors lie to the south
The red wood of the doors are bound by black iron braces. Twin white 
and golden dragons adorn the doors. Two halves of a white lotus come 
together as the door closes to make the single white flower of the clan.
The hall continues to the north.

rooms.name: Hall of the Dragon.
rooms.description:
This is a very dark wooden hallway. Stairs lead up to the second floor from
here. This hall is drastically different from that of the main hall. It has no
carvings, no dragons, and basically has no decorations at all. the wooden
paneled walls are adorn only with small candles.
The hall continues to the north.
A stairway here leads up to the second floor.
The main hall is to the west.

exits.description: You see a flight of wooden stairs.

rooms.name: Hall of the Dragon.
rooms.description:
This is a very dark wooden hallway. This hall is drastically different from 
that of the main hall. It has no carvings, no dragons, and basically has no 
decorations at all. the wooden paneled walls are adorn only with small candles.
The hall continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: Hall of the Dragon.

that of the main hall. It has no carvings, no dragons, and basically has no 
decorations at all. the wooden paneled walls are adorn only with small candles.
The hall continues to the south and west.

This is a very dark wooden hallway. This hall is drastically different from 
that of the main hall. It has no carvings, no dragons, and basically has no 
decorations at all. the wooden paneled walls are adorn only with small candles.
The hall continues to the north and south.

rooms.description:

that of the main hall. It has no carvings, no dragons, and basically has no

The hall continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Hall of the Dragon.
rooms.description:
This is a very dark wooden hallway. This hall is drastically different from 
that of the main hall. It has no carvings, no dragons, and basically has no 
decorations at all. the wooden paneled walls are adorn only with small candles.
You see here a large wooden arch. The arch is covered with different chinese
characters depicting the 36 basic styles of the clan.
The hall continues to the east.
You see a large stone steps that lead down into the darkness.

exits.description: You see stone steps leading down in to the darkness.

rooms.name: Temple
rooms.description:
The temple is filled with incense smoke and the resonant sounds of many
monks chanting. The chanting seems to almost have a life of its own as it
can be felt even through the hard granite below you. There are red candles
and incense burners along the wall and on small pedestals around the room.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Southern end of the Temple
rooms.description:
Around you are many monks chanting and praying. Tall wooden pillars
disappear in the haze above you. The constant and monotonous tapping of 
a some wooden object rattles your brain and seems to be almost hypnotizing.
The temple is filled with incense smoke and the resonant sounds of many
monks chanting. The chanting seems to almost have a life of its own as it
can be felt even through the hard granite below you. There are red candles
and incense burners along the wall and on small pedestals around the room.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Golden Buddha of Contentment
rooms.description:
Before you stands a giant golden statue of a buddha. This is the Buddha
of Contentment. Many red candles surround the statue's base and all around
the floor. Many offerings of oranges and rice cakes sit in front of the statue.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Golden Buddha of Wisdom
rooms.description:
Before you stands a giant golden statue of a buddha. This is the Buddha
of Wisdom. Many monks come here to pray for enlightenment to a problem
or a decision. Many red candles surround the statue's base and all around
the floor. Many offerings of oranges and rice cakes sit in front of the statue.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Golden Buddha of Enlightenment
rooms.description:
Before you stands a giant golden statue of a buddha. This is the Buddha
of Wisdom. The chanting here seems to be the loudest. The constant
sounding of a gold and the tapping of a hollow wooden ball drowned
out any other sound that you might hear. The monks chanting is rythmic
and a deep monotone buzz. Any individual voice almost undistinguishable
from the others.Many red candles surround the statue's base and all around
the floor. Many offerings of oranges and rice cakes sit in front of the statue.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Northern end of the Temple
rooms.description:
Around you are many monks chanting and praying. Tall wooden pillars
disappear in the haze above you. The constant and monotonous tapping of 
a some wooden object rattles your brain and seems to be almost hypnotizing.
The temple is filled with incense smoke and the resonant sounds of many
monks chanting. The chanting seems to almost have a life of its own as it
can be felt even through the hard granite below you. There are red candles
and incense burners along the wall and on small pedestals around the room.

exits.description: You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.
You can't see much through the haze of incense smoke.

rooms.name: Top of the Stairs
rooms.description:
You stand at the top of a flight of wooden stairs. Loud chanting and murmurs
can be heard from downstairs. These halls seem to be more lavishly furnished
than the ones below. The walls are covered with gold and silver dragons and
small tables with ancient vases line the hall.
There is a stairway that descends to the temple below.
The hall leads off to the east.

exits.description: You see a wooden stairway descending to the temple below.

rooms.name: 2nd floor hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a lavishly furnish hallway. The walls are covered with gold and 
silver dragons and small tables with ancient vases line the hall.
Brightly color red lanterns hang from the ceiling, flickering gently as the
candles inside of them burn slowly away.
The hall continues to the north and west.
To the west you can see a wooden stairway leading down.

rooms.name: 2nd floor hallway
rooms.description:

silver dragons and small tables with ancient vases line the hall.
Brightly color red lanterns hang from the ceiling, flickering gently as the
candles inside of them burn slowly away.
The hall continues to the north and south.

The hall continues to the north and south.

rooms.description:

Brightly color red lanterns hang from the ceiling, flickering gently as the

The hall continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: 2nd floor hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a lavishly furnish hallway. The walls are covered with gold and 
silver dragons and small tables with ancient vases line the hall.
Brightly color red lanterns hang from the ceiling, flickering gently as the

The hall continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Rooms of the White Lotus Chief
rooms.description:
These are the rooms of the White Lotus Chief. He is often meditating or 
reading. He does not like to be disturbed. This room is furnished with 
the occasional chair or table. Although not poor looking, it isn't furnished
with much. It is basically an entry for the other rooms.
The hall continues to the east.
There are rooms to the north, south and west.

exits.description: You see the meditation room of the White Lotus Chief.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description:
This is where the personal guests of the White Lotus Chief stay. The room
is nicely done, with bamboo walls and a wooden floor. A luxurious bed
with silk sheets and pillows stands against the far wall.
The only exit is to the north.

rooms.name: Room of Wei Chin
rooms.description:
This is the room of Wei Chin, the nephew of the White Lotus Chief.
He is here to serve his uncle and practice his kung fu. His room looks
very much unlived in. Wei Chin is usually out traveling and looking
over the towns that the Lotus clan controls.
The only exit is to the south.

rooms.name: Meditation Chamber
rooms.description:
This room is filled with long scrolls that hang on the walls. The scrolls 
recite many teachings of Buddha. Small incense burners sit in each corner
of the room. A small knee high table stands in the middle of the room. The
White Lotus Chief often comes here to pray and meditate. Except for the 
the day of the Dragon Boat festival, on that day he relaxes and spends his
day in the steaming pool.
There are exits in all directions.

exits.description: You see a shrine in the room to the north.
You see a room full of books.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description:
You stand amidst many rows of shelves. The shelves tower above you and
are full of texts from many different areas of the world.
The only exit is to the north.

exits.description: You see a shrine in the room to the north.

rooms.name: Hidden Room
rooms.description:
This is a secret room hidden behind one of the bookshelfs. This is where
many special books and scrolls are kept.the room is lit by a dim lightsource
that is out of sight up above.
The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: Shrine
rooms.description:
This is the private shrine of the White Lotus Chief. He spends many hours
every day here praying and studying. The room is pretty much bare with
the exception of a large shrine, decorated with golden buddhas and many
offerings.
There are exits to the south and west.

rooms.name: Steaming Pool
rooms.description:
This is a very large steaming pool. The White Lotus Chief comes here 
during dragon boat festival to relax. Numerous stone dragon heads spit
steaming streams into the pool. 
There are exits to the south and east.

rooms.name: Chamber of the White Lotus Chief
rooms.description:
This is the lavishly furnished bedroom of the White Lotus Chief. The few
hours of the day that he is not meditating nor studying, he is here sleeping.
Many ancient and beautiful vases adorn the corners of the room. 
There are exits to the north and east.

rooms.name: Entrance to the 36 Chambers
rooms.description:
This cold stone room is complete bare except for a door on the east wall.
This is the entrance to the 36 Chambers of the White Lotus. It is here that
the higher monks and students come to test their skills. The stairway seems
to have disappeared behind you.
The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: 1st Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This cold stone room is complete bare except for a door on the east wall.
It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This
is the first chamber. It is a basic skill chamber where students test thier
skill at punches.
The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: 2nd Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This cold stone room is complete bare except for a door on the east wall.
It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This
is the second chamber. It is a basic skill chamber where students test thier
skill at kicks.
The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: 3rd Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This cold stone room is complete bare except for a door on the east wall.
It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This is
the chamber of the Whirlwind Kick technique. It is a a more difficult 
chamber than the two previous ones. From here on, your skills are tested 
against the masters of the temple.
And to lose from this chamber on..is to lose ones life....
The only exit is to the east.

and consider what you have accomplished. You are half way to the end
of the chambers. No one has every completed all 36 chambers.....
The only exit is to the south.

The only exit is to the east.

It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This

It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This

rooms.description:

rooms.name: 32nd Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:

It is here that the higher monks and students come to test their skills. This

The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: 33rd Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This is the chamber of the Abbot of the White Lotus Clan. If you have reached
this room you are indeed an excellent fighter. The Abbot comes here
periodically when there is a student that is proficient enought with their skills.
The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: 34th Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
You are indeed and expert! This is the 34th Chamber of the White Lotus
Clan. Very few people have the stamina or skill to make it here.
The Grand Abbot of the the Temple awaits you. He is here as the last
test of your skills before you move on to the 36th Chamber.
The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: 35th Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This is a room of meditation and rest. You may drink deeply from the fountain
and eat to fill your body. Ahead is the 36th chamber. From there you will have
graduated from the Temple and sent out to explore the lands. Know well that
the last chamber will truely test your skills and stamina. Focus your mind, and
rest your body......and may you be enlightened....
The only exit is to the west.

rooms.name: 36th Chamber of the White Lotus
rooms.description:
This is the 36th Chamber of the White Lotus Clan. It is the ultimate test of 
one's abilities. If you survive you will surely be blessed by Buddha...
